title: Ice Cream Sandwich Cake Recipe
description: This ice cream sandwich cake is made by layering ice cream sandwiches with hot fudge, caramel, and whipped topping for a decadent frozen dessert.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Desserts Frozen Dessert Recipes Ice Cream Sandwich Cake 4.8 (198) 161 Reviews 22 Photos This ice cream sandwich cake was renamed as "The Best Dessert I've Ever Eaten" by my daughter this Memorial Day. I had made it before, but my husband ate all of it before she had a chance to get a taste! My husband doesn't like when I take this desert to a large gathering because it means he won't have any leftovers! Submitted by DAYMOMMY Updated on May 9, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 22 22 22 22 Prep Time: 30 mins Additional Time: 30 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 12 Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings 24 vanilla ice cream sandwiches, unwrapped 2 (8 ounce) containers whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed 1 (12 ounce) jar hot fudge ice cream topping, warmed 1 (12 ounce) jar caramel ice cream topping ¼ cup chopped pecans, or to taste Directions Gather the ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Arrange a layer of ice cream sandwiches in the bottom of a 9x13-inch dish; top with a layer of whipped topping, hot fudge topping, and caramel topping. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Repeat layering with remaining ice cream sandwiches, whipped topping, hot fudge topping, and caramel topping, ending with a top layer of whipped topping. Sprinkle with pecans. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cover the dish with aluminum foil and freeze until set, about 30 minutes. Slice and serve with your favorite toppings! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 563 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Ice Cream Sandwich Cake 01 of 22 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 22 Photo by  betty bunkowske 03/21/2025 Easy to follow Great flavors A keeper! Family favorite this is such a great recipe. Instead of pecans I used chocolate sprinkles 03 of 22 Photo by  Trusted Brands 08/24/2021 04 of 22 Photo by  Toby Bogard 07/15/2021 05 of 22 Photo by  Jessica Noll 06/03/2020 06 of 22 Photo by  Deb Knisley 05/29/2020 07 of 22 Photo by  Henry Meiser 05/12/2020 Great beyond compare! Only thing I did as a preference was substitute normal ice cream sandwiches for cookies and cream ones, no fudge, just caramel, and added crumbled up mini Oreos to make it a caramel cookies and cream take. Used for moms birthday since we could not get a professional ice cream cake— it was a hit! 08 of 22 Photo by  Henry Meiser 05/12/2020 Great beyond compare! Only thing I did as a preference was substitute normal ice cream sandwiches for cookies and cream ones, no fudge, just caramel, and added crumbled up mini Oreos to make it a caramel cookies and cream take. Used for moms birthday since we could not get a professional ice cream cake— it was a hit! 09 of 22 Photo by  Jaime 08/20/2019 10 of 22 Photo by  DEJABUTLER 05/27/2019 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Fruit Sherbet 41 Ratings Frozen Vanilla Custard 39 Ratings Hot Fudge Ice Cream Bar Dessert 842 Ratings Homemade Fruit Popsicles 125 Ratings Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches 69 Ratings Chef John's Strawberry Ice Cream 138 Ratings Easy Chocolate Icebox Cake 9 Ratings Stars and Stripes Grand Finale Cake 4 Ratings The Old Boy's Strawberry Pie 391 Ratings Lime Sorbet 58 Ratings Frosty Strawberry Squares 85 Ratings Ice Cream Sandwich Dessert Bars 27 Ratings Grilled Fruit Kabobs 15 Ratings Creamy Mango Sorbet 49 Ratings Rainbow Sherbet Cake 57 Ratings Dad's Brandy Ice 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
